messages.subject: RE: [SHQ] Question:Shinsengumi Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Shinsengumi had several colors of uniforms reported by contemporary accounts, so it s likely that they were rotated. Most commonly, though (in films) you see
messages.messageBody:
Shinsengumi had several colors of uniforms reported by contemporary
accounts, so it's likely that they were rotated. Most commonly, though (in
films) you see blue with white triangles for "common" Shinsengumi, black
with white triangles for Hijikata, and white with black triangles for
Kondou.

-M.

messages.subject: Question:Shinsengumi  Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: I notice that in the Shinsengumi uniforms there is a black and white color witch members of the clans wore tose color? I thought it was blue and white and the
messages.messageBody:
I notice that in the Shinsengumi uniforms there is a black and white
color witch members of the clans wore tose color? I thought it was blue
and white and the 47 roinin wore black and white. DOMO, JA MATANE
